text: does anyone here know XML/Xpaths decently well? I'm trying to use EzXML but I can't seem to get the `find` functions to work with Xpaths how I expect. here is a <https://github.com/JuliaIO/EzXML.jl/issues/155|mwe issue> I posted. This could just be personal confusion but the xpath `//foo` should get all of the elements of foo right?
